{{{
 private boolean isPowerOfTwo(Integer number) {
    return Integer.bitCount(number) == 1;
  }
  
  private boolean isPowerOfTwoCheating(Integer number) {
    return (number & (number - 1)) == 0;
  }

  private boolean isPowerOfTwoV2(Integer number) {
    if (number < 2) {
      return false;
    }
    
    boolean itis = false;
    for (int i = 2; i < number; i++) {
      int powerOfTwo = (int) Math.pow(2, i); // 2^i
      
      if (number == powerOfTwo) {
        itis = true;
        break;
      }
    }
    
    return itis;
  }
}}}
